title: I really don't mind skins coming out the way they are right now, butt...
body:
Can you please move champions wings back to their backs?

This butt-wing trend looks really stupid and it needs to stop. 

Whatever Rioter has a buttwing fetish needs to stop pushing it on the rest of us.

replies.body: I could be missing something, but isn't SG Soraka the only one with her wings on her waist? Ezreal's are on his back and I cant find images of any other SG with wings.

Oh, forgot about that, thought you were just complaining about the SG skins.

Either way, I think both of those skins are fine, and 2 skins out of all of the different winged skins isn't that bad even if you are against them.

Everyone is entitled to their own opinion.

But frankly the butt wing thing is strange and not good looking, and that's not an uncommon opinion. 

I could deal with it on the Zyra skin, I just don't want it too become a trend because it frankly looks dumb. SG Raka would of looked better had the wings been in the normal place.
I agree, its stupid. Wings don't belong on your ass. They belong on your back so that you can actually balance when flying. rito logic pls

I see what you did there with the word "butt" in the title of the thread. Anyway, the waist/butt wings are kind of dumb in my opinion.

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

Im torn. I think it looks odd as hell. But I can understand the need to attach them to places where it is easy to animate and rig it to a champ model/skeleton. As long as it never happens to champions with wings in base skin/model, I really cant complain to much
